text.section: Each permit applies only to the particular taxicab designated in the permit.

section.section: Each permit is subject to the terms and conditions that the Commission establishes.
The Commission shall set a term of at least 1 year for each permit.
The Commission may renew a permit in accordance with the standards set forth in § 10-203 of this subtitle.

text.section: If sufficient cause is shown, the Commission may amend, suspend, or revoke a permit.
